name: core_arch::x86::avx2::_mm256_extract_epi8

intrinsics::simd::simd_extract.doc:
Extracts an element from a vector.

 `T` must be a vector with element type `U`, and `idx` must be `const`.

 # Safety

 `idx` must be const and in-bounds of the vector.

doc:
Extracts an 8-bit integer from `a`, selected with `INDEX`. Returns a 32-bit
 integer containing the zero-extended integer data.

 See [LLVM commit D20468](https://reviews.llvm.org/D20468).

 [Intel's documentation](https://www.intel.com/content/www/us/en/docs/intrinsics-guide/index.html#text=_mm256_extract_epi8)
